embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/pBF3dKrVhxQ?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/pBF3dKrVhxQ?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
title: Techniques for improving Python performance
description:
* Using multiprocessing.
  * Using custom extensions.
  * Refactoring code.
  * using comprehensions.
  * Dictionaries v. Lists.
  * Range v. xrange.
  * Profiling.
  * Detecting choke points.
summary:
Andrew Rowe will detail and demonstrate a number of proven techniques for
improving the performance of large Python programs.
